links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
maple: P:=proc(i) local a,b,c,n; for n from 1 by 1 to i do a:=evalf(floor(log10(n!)+1)); b:=n!; c:=0; while a>0 do c:=c+(b-(trunc(b/10)*10))*10^(a-1); b:=trunc(b/10); a:=a-1; od; print(c); od; end: P(100) # _Paolo P. Lava_, Aug 07 2008# second Maple program:a:= n-> (s-> parse(cat(s[-i]$i=1..length(s))))(""||(n!)):seq(a(n), n=0..30);  # _Alois P. Heinz_, Apr 09 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from _Eric M. Schmidt_, Apr 04 2014
